statements.update:
UPDATE XT_MENU SET
BM=#BM# MC=#MC# YYID=#YYID# MS=#MS# SJID=#SJID# JC=#JC# SFMJ=#SFMJ# GLGN=#GLGN# GNID=#GNID# PIC=#PIC# CSZ=#CSZ# DKFS=#DKFS# QXKZPB=#QXKZPB# SFZF=#SFZF# ZFRQ=#ZFRQ# SRM1=#SRM1# SRM2=#SRM2# SRM3=#SRM3# XGYH=#XGYH# XGRQ=#XGRQ# PXXH=#PXXH# PICBIG=#PICBIG# SFM=#SFM# MLBID=#MLBID# MMC=#MMC# MCSZ=#MCSZ# MPXXH=#MPXXH#
where ID=#ID#
statements.select:
select ID,BM,MC,YYID,MS,SJID,JC,SFMJ,GLGN,GNID,PIC,CSZ,DKFS,QXKZPB,SFZF,ZFRQ,SRM1,SRM2,SRM3,XGR,XGRQ,PXXH,PICBIG,SFM,MLBID,MMC,MCSZ,MPXXH from XT_MENU
ID=#ID# BM=#BM# MC=#MC# YYID=#YYID# MS=#MS# SJID=#SJID# JC=#JC# SFMJ=#SFMJ# GLGN=#GLGN# GNID=#GNID# PIC=#PIC# CSZ=#CSZ# DKFS=#DKFS# QXKZPB=#QXKZPB# SFZF=#SFZF# ZFRQ>=${ibatis_key_todate}#ZFRQ_START#${ibatis_key_plus}' 00:00:00'${ibatis_key_todate_end} ZFRQ<=${ibatis_key_todate}#ZFRQ_END#${ibatis_key_plus}' 23:59:59'${ibatis_key_todate_end} SRM1=#SRM1# SRM2=#SRM2# SRM3=#SRM3# XGYH=#XGYH# XGRQ>=${ibatis_key_todate}#XGRQ_START#${ibatis_key_plus}' 00:00:00'${ibatis_key_todate_end} XGRQ<=${ibatis_key_todate}#XGRQ_END#${ibatis_key_plus}' 23:59:59'${ibatis_key_todate_end} PXXH=#PXXH# PICBIG=#PICBIG# SFM=#SFM# MLBID=#MLBID# MMC=#MMC# MCSZ=#MCSZ# MPXXH=#MPXXH# $WHERE_CLAUSE$
$ORDER_BY_CLAUSE$

select ID,BM,MC,YYID,MS,SJID,JC,SFMJ,GLGN,GNID,PIC,CSZ,DKFS,QXKZPB,SFZF,ZFRQ,SRM1,SRM2,SRM3,XGR,XGRQ,PXXH,PICBIG,SFM,MLBID,MMC,MCSZ,MPXXH from XT_MENU
ID=#ID# BM=#BM# MC=#MC# YYID=#YYID# MS=#MS# SJID=#SJID# JC=#JC# SFMJ=#SFMJ# GLGN=#GLGN# GNID=#GNID# PIC=#PIC# CSZ=#CSZ# DKFS=#DKFS# QXKZPB=#QXKZPB# SFZF=#SFZF# ZFRQ>=${ibatis_key_todate}#ZFRQ_START#${ibatis_key_plus}' 00:00:00'${ibatis_key_todate_end} ZFRQ<=${ibatis_key_todate}#ZFRQ_END#${ibatis_key_plus}' 23:59:59'${ibatis_key_todate_end} SRM1=#SRM1# SRM2=#SRM2# SRM3=#SRM3# XGYH=#XGYH# XGRQ>=${ibatis_key_todate}#XGRQ_START#${ibatis_key_plus}' 00:00:00'${ibatis_key_todate_end} XGRQ<=${ibatis_key_todate}#XGRQ_END#${ibatis_key_plus}' 23:59:59'${ibatis_key_todate_end} PXXH=#PXXH# PICBIG=#PICBIG# SFM=#SFM# MLBID=#MLBID# MMC=#MMC# MCSZ=#MCSZ# MPXXH=#MPXXH# $WHERE_CLAUSE$
$ORDER_BY_CLAUSE$

SELECT A.GNID,B.ID,A.OPID,A.OPMC,(CASE WHEN B.ID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE B.QXKZPB END) AS QXKZPB,a.pxxh FROM XT_GNMK_OP A LEFT JOIN XT_MENU_OP B ON A.GNID=B.GNID AND B.ID='$ID$' and A.OPID=B.OPID where A.GNID='$GNID$' and a.SFzf=0 union all select gnid,ID,opid,opmc,qxkzpb,pxxh from XT_MENU_OP where ID='$ID$' and (gnid is null or gnid ='') ORDER BY PXXH

SELECT DISTINCT X.URL,X.SJID,X.ID,X.MC,X.YYID,X.PIC,X.PICBIG,X.DKFS,X.CSZ,X.GLGN,X.GNID,X.SRM1,X.SRM2,X.PXXH FROM ( SELECT E.URL,A.SJID,A.ID,A.MC,A.YYID,A.PIC,A.PICBIG,A.DKFS,A.CSZ,A.GLGN,A.GNID,A.SRM1,A.SRM2,A.PXXH FROM XT_MENU A INNER JOIN XT_YHZQX B ON A.ID=B.MENUID INNER JOIN XT_YHZYH C ON B.YHZID=C.YHZID LEFT JOIN XT_GN E ON A.GNID=E.ID WHERE C.YHID=#YHID# AND A.SFZF=0 AND A.QXKZPB=1 AND A.YYID=#YYID# UNION SELECT E.URL,A.SJID,A.ID,A.MC,A.YYID,A.PIC,A.PICBIG,A.DKFS,A.CSZ,A.GLGN,A.GNID,A.SRM1,A.SRM2,A.PXXH FROM XT_MENU A LEFT JOIN XT_GN E ON A.GNID=E.ID WHERE A.QXKZPB=0 AND A.SFZF=0 AND A.YYID=#YYID# ) X ORDER BY X.PXXH ASC

select distinct x.murl, x.mid, x.mmc, x.mcsz, x.pxxh, x.MLBID,x.mpxxh from (select e.murl, a.ID as mid, case when a.mmc is null then a.MC else a.mmc end as mmc, case when a.mcsz is null then a.csz else a.mcsz end as mcsz, a.pxxh, a.MLBID, a.mpxxh from xt_menu a inner join xt_yhzqx b on a.ID = b.ID inner join xt_yhzcy c on b.yhzid = c.yhzid left join xt_gnmk e on a.gnid = e.gnid where c.yhid = #YHID# and a.SFzf = 0 and a.qxkzpb = 1 and a.SFM = 1 and e.SFM = 1 union select e.murl, a.ID as mid, case when a.mmc is null then a.MC else a.mmc end as mmc, case when a.mcsz is null then a.csz else a.mcsz end as mcsz, a.pxxh, a.MLBID, a.mpxxh from xt_menu a left join xt_gnmk e on a.gnid = e.gnid where a.qxkzpb = 0 and a.SFzf = 0 and a.SFM = 1 and e.SFM = 1) x order by x.mpxxh asc

select distinct x.qxkz, X.url,x.sjid,x.ID,x.MC,x.yyid,x.pic,x.picbig,x.dkfs,x.csz,x.GLgn,x.gnid,x.srm1,x.srm2,x.pxxh,x.yhzmc from ( select 0 as qxkz, e.url,a.sjid,a.ID,a.MC,a.yyid,a.pic,a.picbig,a.dkfs,a.csz,a.GLgn,a.gnid,a.srm1,a.srm2,a.pxxh,null as yhzmc from xt_menu a left join xt_gnmk e on a.gnid=e.gnid where a.SFzf=0 and a.qxkzpb=1 and a.yyid=#YYID# and a.ID not in ( select a.ID from xt_menu a inner join xt_yhzqx b on a.ID=b.ID inner join xt_yhzcy c on b.yhzid=c.yhzid left join xt_gnmk e on a.gnid=e.gnid where c.yhid=#YHID# and a.SFzf=0 and a.qxkzpb=1 and a.yyid=#YYID# ) UNION ALL select 1 as qxkz, e.url,a.sjid,a.ID,a.MC,a.yyid,a.pic,a.picbig,a.dkfs,a.csz,a.GLgn,a.gnid,a.srm1,a.srm2,a.pxxh,wmsys.wm_concat(f.yhzmc) as yhzmc from xt_menu a inner join xt_yhzqx b on a.ID=b.ID inner join xt_yhzcy c on b.yhzid=c.yhzid inner join xt_yhz f on c.yhzid=f.yhzid left join xt_gnmk e on a.gnid=e.gnid where c.yhid=#YHID# and a.SFzf=0 and a.qxkzpb=1 and a.yyid=#YYID# group by e.url,a.sjid,a.ID,a.MC,a.yyid,a.pic,a.picbig,a.dkfs,a.csz,a.GLgn,a.gnid,a.srm1,a.srm2,a.pxxh union select 2 as qxkz,e.url,a.sjid,a.ID,a.MC,a.yyid,a.pic,a.picbig,a.dkfs,a.csz,a.GLgn,a.gnid,a.srm1,a.srm2,a.pxxh,null as yhzmc from xt_menu a left join xt_gnmk e on a.gnid=e.gnid where a.qxkzpb=0 and a.SFzf=0 and a.yyid=#YYID# ) x order by x.pxxh asc

select distinct x.qxkz, X.url,x.sjid,x.ID,x.MC,x.yyid,x.pic,x.picbig,x.dkfs,x.csz,x.GLgn,x.gnid,x.srm1,x.srm2,x.pxxh,x.yhzmc from ( select 0 as qxkz, e.url,a.sjid,a.ID,a.MC,a.yyid,a.pic,a.picbig,a.dkfs,a.csz,a.GLgn,a.gnid,a.srm1,a.srm2,a.pxxh,null as yhzmc from xt_menu a left join xt_gnmk e on a.gnid=e.gnid where a.SFzf=0 and a.qxkzpb=1 and a.yyid=#YYID# and a.ID not in ( select a.ID from xt_menu a inner join xt_yhzqx b on a.ID=b.ID inner join xt_yhzcy c on b.yhzid=c.yhzid left join xt_gnmk e on a.gnid=e.gnid where c.yhid=#YHID# and a.SFzf=0 and a.qxkzpb=1 and a.yyid=#YYID# ) UNION ALL select 1 as qxkz, e.url,a.sjid,a.ID,a.MC,a.yyid,a.pic,a.picbig,a.dkfs,a.csz,a.GLgn,a.gnid,a.srm1,a.srm2,a.pxxh, yhzmc=stuff((select ','+K.yhzmc from xt_yhzqx m,xt_yhzcy n,xt_yhz k where n.yhzid=k.yhzid and m.ID=a.ID and m.yhzid=n.yhzid and n.yhid=#YHID# for xml path('')), 1, 1, '') from xt_menu a inner join xt_yhzqx b on a.ID=b.ID inner join xt_yhzcy c on b.yhzid=c.yhzid inner join xt_yhz f on c.yhzid=f.yhzid left join xt_gnmk e on a.gnid=e.gnid where c.yhid=#YHID# and a.SFzf=0 and a.qxkzpb=1 and a.yyid=#YYID# group by e.url,a.sjid,a.ID,a.MC,a.yyid,a.pic,a.picbig,a.dkfs,a.csz,a.GLgn,a.gnid,a.srm1,a.srm2,a.pxxh union select 2 as qxkz,e.url,a.sjid,a.ID,a.MC,a.yyid,a.pic,a.picbig,a.dkfs,a.csz,a.GLgn,a.gnid,a.srm1,a.srm2,a.pxxh,null as yhzmc from xt_menu a left join xt_gnmk e on a.gnid=e.gnid where a.qxkzpb=0 and a.SFzf=0 and a.yyid=#YYID# ) x order by x.pxxh asc
select b.url,a.csz from xt_menu a,xt_gnmk b where a.gnid=b.gnid and a.ID=#ID#

select a.ID,a.opid,a.opdm from xt_menu_op a where qxkzpb=1 and a.ID=#ID# and a.opid not in ( select a.opid from xt_menu_op a inner join xt_yhzqx b on a.ID${ibatis_key_plus}'_'${ibatis_key_plus}A.OPID=b.ID inner join xt_yhzcy c on b.yhzid=c.yhzid where c.yhid=#YHID# and a.ID=#ID# )

SELECT DISTINCT X.YYID,X.YYMC,X.PXXH FROM ( SELECT A.YYID,E.MC AS YYMC,E.PXXH FROM XT_MENU A INNER JOIN XT_YHZQX B ON A.ID=B.MENUID INNER JOIN XT_YHZYH C ON B.YHZID=C.YHZID INNER JOIN XT_YY E ON A.YYID=E.ID WHERE C.YHID=1 AND A.SFZF=0 AND A.QXKZPB=1 AND E.SFZF=0 UNION SELECT A.YYID,B.MC AS YYMC,B.PXXH FROM XT_MENU A, XT_YY B WHERE A.QXKZPB=0 AND A.SFZF=0 AND A.YYID=B.ID AND B.SFZF=0 ) X ORDER BY X.PXXH ASC
